Class.name: Telegram.Bot.AnswerCallbackQuery
Class.Description: Use this method to send answers to callback queries sent from inline keyboards. The answer will be displayed to the user as a notification at the top of the chat screen or as an alert. On success, True is returned.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: set .."callback_query_id" = callbackQueryId set ..text = text set .."show_alert" = showAlert return $$$OK
